abilities.name: Miracle Oracle
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may draw a card. Then, discard a card from your hand. If you discard an Energy card, draw 1 more card. This power can't be used if Bronzong is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Shady Stamp
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Confused.
